thread.title: StaffDNA to launch Searchable Database of Nurses and Allied Clinicians
thread.title_full: StaffDNA to launch Searchable Database of Nurses and Allied Clinicians

author: admin
title: StaffDNA to launch Searchable Database of Nurses and Allied Clinicians
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/28/2015 @ 1:25 PM   StaffDNA, LLC 
DALLAS, Sept. 28, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- StaffDNA is expanding the way employers can find qualified healthcare talent by launching Clinician SmartSearch, a searchable database of nearly one million clinicians' information. This new platform allows healthcare employers to quickly and easily find and connect with only the types of candidates they need without spending hours with 'old-fashioned' searching. 
Employers who are registered with StaffDNA will soon have access to this database, which will allow them to specify their criteria by profession, specialty, available start date, desired job type and years of experience. To learn more about a specific candidate found through the database, one click provides the user a downloadable profile that includes the candidate's contact information and other employment data-such as license and certification information or skills checklist-when provided by the candidate. 
"Healthcare employers understand the importance of finding qualified candidates in a timely manner," says Sheldon Arora, StaffDNA founder and CEO. "StaffDNA's Clinician SmartSearch will show only the most relevant candidates per your criteria with the ease of a few clicks." 
Access to StaffDNA's Clinician SmartSearch will be available in November by monthly subscription. To learn more about StaffDNA's candidate services, or to sign up for StaffDNA Clinician SmartSearch, visit www.staffdna.com . 
About StaffDNA, LLC 
StaffDNA was founded by veterans of the healthcare staffing industry and a group of private investors. The company's mission is to fundamentally change the approach of healthcare employment by giving healthcare candidates the tools to manage and navigate the complex nature of the healthcare job market. StaffDNA provides employers with direct and immediate access to qualified talent that isn't discovered by any other source. 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/staffdna-to-launch-searchable-database-of-nurses-and-allied-clinicians-300150160.html 
SOURCE StaffDNA, LLC
